page.title: 19LOCAL CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content:
1. British Legion 2. Women's British Legion 3. Women's Institute 4. Evergreens (Ladies' over 60s Club) 5. Youth Club 6. Brownies 7. Badminton Club 8. Football Club
All of the above clubs meet regularly in the Village Hall. In addition, other activities that take place in the Village Hall include: Bingo, Rummage Sales, Coffee evenings. Several committees meet regularly in the Village Hall and these include: the Parish Council and the Village Hall committee. The school entertains the village regularly with concerts and plays.
